content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Haoyu Wang from China. While discussing the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg, let me emphasize its prime location, modern amenities, and excellent construction quality. With such desirable features, I'd like to propose an initial price of 1200 Euros per month. Do consider how unique this opportunity is and how convenient it would be for you. If this price suits you, I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! However, if not satisfied, please share your concerns so I can evaluate if any adjustments can be made. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
